database.name: VIEW OBPOS_CATEGORYVIEW
database.view: SELECT c.m_product_category_id, c.ad_client_id, c.ad_org_id, c.isactive, c.created, c.createdby, c.updated, c.updatedby, c.name, c.em_obpos_catalog, c.em_obpos_line, img.binarydata FROM m_product_category c LEFT JOIN ad_image img ON img.ad_image_id = c.em_obpos_image_id
